parameters.name: ActionParams
parameters.description: A action-related parameter. This parameter can be extended based on your business requirements. This parameter value varies with the value of the TaskAction parameter.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~61933~~) operation to query the region ID.

parameters.name: StepName
parameters.description: The name of the step visible to the user.

parameters.name: TaskAction
parameters.description: The action name that corresponds to the state described in the actionInfo parameter of the [DescribeHistoryTasks](~~2639186~~) operation.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The task ID. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,). You can specify up to 10 task IDs.
